scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains letters to John Wesley Hunt, bills of lading, and account statements documenting John W. Hunt's purchases from various businessmen. Letters from business associates discuss hemp and yarn sales as well as horses and money, while letters from John W. Hunt's parents, Abraham and Mary Hunt, discuss their respective illnesses and express desire to see him and his family. The bills of lading document goods shipped by John W. Hunt of Lexington, Kentucky, to John Henderson in Natchez, Louisiana, and Bartlet and Cox in New Orleans, Louisiana.
